fields.text: Welcome to Gorgias, your dedicated Shopify customer support helpdesk based in San Francisco.
For help with your Gorgias helpdesk on Shopify, press [INDEX].
For technical assistance with integrations and setup, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.
For billing, invoices, and account questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a billing specialist.
For new account inquiries and sales information, press [INDEX].
For pricing, plans, and feature details, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for pricing information.
To schedule a personalized demo or trial, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a representative to schedule your demo.
